fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per night, you may place an explosive device on a player of your choice.
- Once per game, you may place two devices in one night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player with a device visits another player with a device, all devices will explode and attack the players they are attached to.
- You may plant a device on yourself; however, visiting a target while you have a device won't trigger it unless the device on the other player is from a previous night.
- You are immune to Detonator explosions.
- You are redirection immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Kill all who would oppose you.
